content:
Hi all, since we had the CUPiD working time today, I'm not sure whether we should also have the weekly ADF hackathon.

I need to leave early today anyway, so I don't think I'll be there... so it is up to
@Justin Richling @Jesse Nusbaumer @Dani Coleman @Lev Romashkov

Brian Medeiros said:

Hi all, since we had the CUPiD working time today, I'm not sure whether we should also have the weekly ADF hackathon.

I need to leave early today anyway, so I don't think I'll be there... so it is up to
Justin Richling Jesse Nusbaumer Dani Coleman Lev Romashkov

I wasn't planning on it, but if there's anything I can be helpful with let me know and I'll drop by
I was planning on only going if @Dani Coleman goes to work on a PR. I know Jesse is doing CCPP stuff. I'll probably fire up the meeting, but attend only if you want!

I'm in the meeting now. @Justin Richling , did you get my review on your PR yesterday?
I'd love to get an update about the CUPID meeting since I ended up not being able to go.
